item.description:
Sel de la Terre ( http://www.seldelater... ) on the Boston Waterfront has a wine tasting event each Wednesday evening. On November 4th, the restaurant will feature a 4-course tasting menu complemented by 4 wines from Italy. The cost of this event is $38+tax & tip. Interesting side dishes will also be available for a nominal fee. And if you still have room for more after the tastings, we can stay for coffee and dessert. For this event, separate checks will be issued, so that you may use your credit card or cash and add your own tip. The restaurant is located across from the Long Wharf Marriott Hotel and the Aquarium T-stop. The event begins at 7:00 but please try to be there by 6:45 so that we can introduce everyone and hold our reservation. This event sells out weekly.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further guidelines.
item.name: Sel de la Terre-Wine Tasting
